ygData.msgSnippet: Necromancer/Hell Drak Necromancer looked at the Maximal, Firearm. As I said before, my name is Necromancer, and this is my sister Hell Drak.  We are elite

Necromancer/Hell Drak

                Necromancer looked at the Maximal, Firearm.

            "As I said before, my name is Necromancer, and this is my sister
Hell Drak.  We are elite bots sent to help you Maximals.  We will fight all
enemies of the Maximals, and only for the Maximal cause.  We promise to
show--" Necromancer was cut off by Hell Drak.

            She said, "Look, we're very skilled bots who have come to fight
on the side of the Maximals."

            Necromancer stroke Hell Drak with an angry look, and then turned
to Firearm again, "Sorry about that, my sister's attitude is
sometime's......Annoying.  Anyway, that is our story, please accept us into
your faction to fight for peace!"
